confirmAddress.caption: Please check the address carefully before ordering your plug-in.
confirmAddress.title: Confirm address and place order

connectAccount.caption_loggedIn:
We need to connect your AA account with your AA-X account. We need to do this so we can match your details.

It will only take a minute then you’ll be all setup.
connectAccount.caption_loggedOut:
We’ll take you to the AA website to sign in, so have your username and password ready.

If you haven’t used the AA website or App before, don’t worry - you can create an account.
connectAccount.heading: We just need to connect your AA-X account with your AA account
connectAccount.title: Connect with your AA account

connectOem.caption: Your car collects lots of useful data all the time. Having this is the key to AA-X’s  engine. We can’t run without it. So let’s get you sharing.
connectOem.heading: Get personalised insights and alerts by linking your car to the app

infoModal.caption:
Your car collects lots of useful data all the time. Having this is the key to AA-X’s engine. We can’t run without it.

We analyse the information we get from your car to give you personalised insights about its health, help you look after your battery and engine, and learn how to drive more efficiently.

If you decide not to share your data with us, you’ll no longer be able to use AA-X.

Please make sure you read the manufacturer’s privacy notice about how they process your personal information.
infoModal.title: How we use the data

connectOem.title: Connect your car data

deliveryAddress.caption: * Mandatory fields.
deliveryAddress.heading: Enter your address
deliveryAddress.subheading: We’ll send your plug-in to the address below. UK only.
deliveryAddress.title: Order your plug-in

disclaimer.caption: Important information about your AA-X account
disclaimer.listItem1: AA-X is separate from your AA Breakdown membership. It stands alone as it’s own useful product.
disclaimer.listItem2: The AA-X app is currently free for  eligible customers for their first 12 months, with no obligation to renew.
disclaimer.listItem3: We might give you alerts about your car’s health and possible faults. We usually get it right, but our suggestions should always be confirmed by an inspection.
disclaimer.listItem4: AA-X Repairs are not included and must be purchased separately.
disclaimer.title: Create your AA-X account

dongleInfo.connection: The plug-in fits easily into a port in your car allowing it to talk to AA-X.

infoModal.caption:
The plug-in is a little pairing device that allows your car’s computer to talk to the app.

It uses similar technology as a garages performing a diagnostic test.

This is how we give you personalised health updates and important alerts about your battery, engine and more.
infoModal.title: About the AA-X plug-in

dongleInfo.title: Now it’s time to order your plug-in

eligibilityCheck.caption: AA-X is currently available for AA Breakdown members.
eligibilityCheck.enterCaption: Enter your registration number to check

infoModal.caption:
AA-X covers most vehicle makes and models.

Petrol/hybrid vehicles from 2001 onwards.
Diesel/hybrid vehicles from 2006 onwards.

We aren’t set up for electric vehicles yet, but we are working on it.
infoModal.title: About compatible vehicles

eligibilityCheck.pressable: Most makes and models of car are compatible.
eligibilityCheck.title: Check whether your vehicle is compatible

eligibilityError.caption: We can’t offer you an AA-X account. Probably because of the age of your vehicle.
eligibilityError.title: Sorry, your vehicle isn’t compatible

eligibilitySuccess.caption: Sweet. We’ve found your car. Please confirm we’ve got it right.
eligibilitySuccess.info: Not your vehicle? You can go back to the confirm compatibility step and retry.
eligibilitySuccess.title: Great news your car is compatible

notificationConsent.subheading: Enable notifications to get the most out of AA-X, like health updates, potential faults and appointment reminders.
notificationConsent.title: Switch on alerts and reminders

oemConfirmation.caption: Thanks, consent has been authorised and we are connecting the data.
oemConfirmation.heading: All done

oemConsent.caption: There you will enter information about your car, so it can share data with the app.
oemConsent.heading: We’re taking you to your manufacturer’s website
oemConsent.title: Connect your car data

oemInfo.connection: Connect to your car manufacturer’s feed and it will  send data direct to the app. No plug-in required.

infoModal.caption:
The plug-in is a little pairing device that allows your car’s computer to talk to the app.

It uses similar technology as a garages performing a diagnostic test.

This is how we give you personalised health updates and important alerts about your battery, engine and more.
infoModal.title: About connecting to manufacturer

oemInfo.infoPressable: Learn more about the OEM connection
oemInfo.title: Your vehicle is compatible via direct connection

orderConfirmed.heading: It should arrive in 2-3 working days
orderConfirmed.subheading: We’ll send you status updates in the app
orderConfirmed.title: Order received, Woohoo!

login.button: Already an AAx member? Sign in

welcome.subtitle_page1: AA-X connects to your car to help you understand and take action on insights and predictions
welcome.subtitle_page2: Real time data straight from your car helps nip problems in the bud
welcome.subtitle_page3: Rest easy with the AA garage network and estimates up front
welcome.subtitle_page4: With a plug-in device or directly to your car’s computer
welcome.title_page1: Take the stress out of car ownership with car intelligence
welcome.title_page2: Get personalised health updates and important alerts
welcome.title_page4: Simply connect your car to your phone
